clinicalSignificance.comment: The c.843-6T>C PAH variant has been reported in 1 Northwest Chinese patient with PAH deficiency (Phe ≥ 1200 μmol/L) (PMID: 30747360). A defect in BH4 metabolism was excluded through a BH4 loading test, urinary pterin analysis, and DHPR activity assay. This variant is absent from population databases gnomAD, 1000 Genomes and ESP. Splicing prediction algorithms are conflicting. In summary, this variant meets criteria to be classified as uncertain significance for PAH. PAH-specific ACMG/AMP criteria applied: PM2, PP4_moderate.
